website_summaries.verdict: A mid-range HDTV with plenty of inputs for gaming consoles or Blu-ray players that works best as a second television.
pros: Clear picture, owners note, and its 4 HDMI ports are a big plus
Audio outputs to auxiliary speakers work well
Gaming consoles interface well with this TV
Users like the 20-degree swivel of the TV base
cons: The two-step input switching process is annoying to most owners
Some aren’t impressed with the screen sharpness
Colors wash out in HD format, some report
Sound from the built-in 10-watt speakers is barely adequate
